item.title: Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) in Computer Graphics
item.description: How do you find structure in a cloud of scattered points? In this post, we examine the utility of Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) in solving this geometric problem, focusing on how to extract the best-fit plane around a specific point in a dataset.

item.title: Introduction to Depth Of Field - Part I
item.description: Depth of Field (DOF) is a popular effect, used to convey a sense of of depth to a large scene, or in some cases, used as an artistic tool to transmit certain emotions and to alter the composition of a scene.
